Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First lets list out the sequences for each case to identify the patterns Case 1 1 RA 2 VF 3 AE 4 RMI 5 VF 6 AD 7 SC 8 AC Case 2 1 RA 2 VF 3 AE 4 AD 5 SC 6 AC Case 3 1 RA 2 VF 3 AE 4 RMI 5 RMI 6 VF 7 AD 8 SC 9 AC

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: From these we can see that the main sequence is RA VF AE AD SC AC However theres an optional loop where RMI and subsequent VF can occur between AE and AD In case 3 RMI is repeated twice before VF is done again

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: The loop seems to be after AE you might have zero or more iterations of RMI followed by VF then proceed to AD

Name: Validation - NE
Text: In case 3 its RMI RMI then VF So its RMI RMI VF which doesnt fit VF would need to come after each RMI Hmm maybe the loop is different

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: perhaps the loop is after AE you can have zero or more iterations of RMI and then you do VF again before proceeding to AD

Name: Validation - NE
Text: in case 2 theres no RMI so AE is directly followed by AD but that would skip the second VF It seems that in case 2 the second VF is not present

Name: Backtracking - IND
Text: the correct interpretation is that after AE you can have zero or more iterations of RMI and then if there was at least one RMI you must do VF otherwise you proceed to AD This is a bit complex

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: model it as X tau AD  -> AE * tau RMI VF AD

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: the structure would be -> AE X tau  -> * tau RMI VF then AD

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: check the cases Case 2 AE choose first branch tau AD Case 1 choose second branch loop once RMI then VF AD Case 3 loop twice RMI RMI then VF AD

Name: Validation - PE
Text: This seems to work Now the full process tree is -> RA -> VF -> AE X tau -> * tau RMI VF AD -> SC -> AC

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - IND
Text: An alternative could be to model the loop as * tau RMI VF but then it would require that VF follows every RMI which is not what we see in case 3 So our current model seems best
